title: Prizma Visuals
author: Starfish Studios
description:
Experience Minecraft like never before with Prizma Visuals! This ultimate resource pack overhaul enhances your world with realistic skies, vibrant water, custom 3D foliage, and refined textures that maintain the vanilla spirit while pushing visual limits. 

Features:
- Custom skyboxes with dynamic atmosphere
- Enhanced water transparency and reflections
- 3D Bushy leaves and realistic grass
- Performance-optimized textures
- Optimized for both high-end and low-end devices
